mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT 0 ISCHECK, ZJID AS NODEID, CDMC AS LABEL, SJCD AS PARENTNODEID, 'MENU' TYPE, CDXH AS XH FROM TB_CDXX WHERE TB_CDXX.Sybz = 1 and TB_CDXX.Jlyxzt = 1 UNION SELECT 1 ISCHECK, ZJID AS NODEID, GNMC AS LABEL, CDXX_ZJID AS PARENTNODEID, 'FUNC' TYPE, GNXH AS XH FROM TB_GNXX T1 WHERE T1.Sybz = 1 and t1.jlyxzt = 1 and EXISTS (SELECT T2.GNXX_ZJID FROM TB_YHXX_R_GNXX T2 WHERE T1.ZJID = T2.GNXX_ZJID AND T2.YHXX_ZJID = #{userId}) UNION SELECT 0 ISCHECK, ZJID AS NODEID, GNMC AS LABEL, CDXX_ZJID AS PARENTNODEID, 'FUNC' TYPE, GNXH AS XH FROM TB_GNXX T1 WHERE T1.Sybz = 1 and t1.jlyxzt = 1 and NOT EXISTS (SELECT T2.GNXX_ZJID FROM TB_YHXX_R_GNXX T2 WHERE T1.ZJID = T2.GNXX_ZJID AND T2.YHXX_ZJID = #{userId})) A ORDER by XH
